EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your referral to Ankin Law Firm.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!litify_pm__Referral__c.litify_pm__Originating_Firm__c},
Thank you for your continued partnership with Ankin Law firm. We have thoroughly vetted the referral you sent to us.
We believe that we will be able to assist {!litify_pm__Referral__c.litify_pm__Client_First_Name__c} {!litify_pm__Referral__c.litify_pm__Client_Last_Name__c} and will accept the referral, at this time. If you need any additional information from us, please do not hesitate to reach out.
Thank you, and we look forward to continuing to partner with your firm.
Sincerely,
{!User.Name} Ankin Law Firm
